_sText:
Surf_Deceptive

The vid features the beta version of the map. There is no bonus in this vid and there is also some extra features/ detail added after the video was made.
<object width="480" height="295"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/pj9P7Bz5FyY&hl=en_US&fs=1&color1=0x3a3a3a&color2=0x999999&hd=1"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/pj9P7Bz5FyY&hl=en_US&fs=1&color1=0x3a3a3a&color2=0x999999&hd=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="480" height="295"></embed></object>



Map by razEr

Credit room by Billy : )

- This is my last staged skill surf map, so I don't want any flame comments on it being a staged skill surf.

- 5 levels and one bonus.

- If you end the bonus the end room will open a hole in the floor and a new button. This grants you 20 points.

This map has no jail, it has a point system, which grants you points depending on how far you get. (Level 3 - 3 points etc.)

If you finish the map you will be granted 10 points, and a button that ends the round.

The timer is set to 5 minutes, if that runs out, you will be granted points depending on your level.

The bonus entrance is at the end of 3. (Made by Zoomj)

There are several secrets in this map, if you see a sprite( a glowing little thing), try walking into it, and see what happens. There is also a hidden knife at spawn. ( it is in a corner and it is invisible)

A big thanx to zoomj for his wonderful bonus, and Sangre for the awesome texture scheme (looking forward to your next map ; P )

Also a big thanks goes out to KSF.

I hope you enjoy playing my map, and have fun ; )
